channel.title: Ffs erasedpkz client
channel.description: With all clients like the erased pkz client for the [pi] source i get this [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/260pv5y.jpg[/img] When me and my beta testers are on we will randomly dc due to these erros. And it happens a lotttttttt.... I only like this source because it has torva and i have yet to find another 317 with primal and torva. I tried a different 317 to see if that client would do it and it doesnt. Infact its totally lag free. Its just the stupid fucking client idk what the fuck is wrong with it.

item.title: Ffs erasedpkz client
item.dc:creator: @total_pkz total pkz
item.description:
@total_pkz wrote:

deadlock means that every, EXample.
every 1-24 hours youre server will automatically shutdown only the hoster can login
the priviate server staus will also show online

my servers deadlock shut down every 12 hours requirering me2 restart it on
time for my players to enjoy my game.

there is many guides that help with fixing this

But very few work for each client(IE Erased-Pkz)wish you luck

Cheers, Total pkz

Rep me if this help hahah!

Read full topic
